name: The Villain Wants to Live
author: Jee Gab Song &#40지갑송&#41
content: The mid-boss of the AAA-grade game our company was developing.A villain who dies 999 times out of 1,000.Deculein von Grahan Yukline.That person... was now me.&quotI&#039m bound to die in almost every route.&quotAs a villain, Deculein is inevitably destined to perish.[Primary Survival Goal: Become necessary to the game.]If death is my fate, then I will twist fate itself to survive.[The Villain Wants to Live]
